text:
Berlin, Germany - deepstream.io/deepstreamhub FULL TIME, ONSITE

We are looking for a skilled backend developer with experience in both low level network programming and NodeJS, passionate about building a scalable realtime platform that will be used by thousands of customers to power IoT, gaming, social apps and a wide range of other usecases.

More information here: https://deepstreamhub.com/careers/server-developer/
